Steven Tyler , 62, revealed on`` The Late Show with David Letterman '' Monday that during the accident- which led to broken bones and the cancellation of Aerosmith's tour- he was high. It's not any news here about my drug use and addictions in the past, the frontman said when asked about the tumble.`` A couple years ago, you know, I was doing Lunesta because I had some problems with my feet.'' To Hell And Back is a vivid, behind-the-scenes look into pit bull rescue, chronicling the rehabilitation of 3 dogs seized from the property of NFL football Quarterback Michael Vick . Featuring tattoo artist Brandon Bond( two time international Tattoo Artist of the Year and owner of the renowned ALL OR NOTHING TATTOO studio) as well as his family and staff, we witness their heroic efforts to save the misunderstood American Pit Bull Terrier Breed( APBT) from dog fighting and
